hero.badge: The AI That Actually Gets Anime
hero.title: Niji V7
hero.subtitle: Prompt Generator
hero.description: Create perfect prompts for Niji V7. Generate stunning anime art with our free tools, templates, and comprehensive parameter guide.

whyV7.title: Why V7 Changes Everything
whyV7.subtitle: Real improvements that matter for anime artists and enthusiasts

coherency.title: Rock-Solid Consistency
coherency.desc: Say goodbye to wonky eyes and mismatched details. V7 delivers dramatically improved consistency across every element—from reflections to backgrounds to character features.

lineart.title: Beautiful Lineart
lineart.desc: Clean, confident strokes that capture the essence of professional anime illustration. The kind of linework that even seasoned artists admire.

prompt.title: It Actually Listens
prompt.desc: V7 understands what you're asking for. Complex prompts, specific character details, particular poses—it gets it right more often than you'd expect.

sref.title: Style Reference
sref.desc: Lock in your aesthetic with the powerful --sref feature. Build a consistent visual identity across all your work—perfect for character sheets and series.

howTo.title: Get Started in Minutes
howTo.subtitle: From signup to stunning anime art in three simple steps

step1.title: Create Your Account
step1.desc: Head to the official Niji Journey site or join the Discord server. You can start with a free trial to test the waters.

step2.title: Craft Your Prompt
step2.desc: Describe what you want to create. Add "--niji 7" to your prompt to unlock V7's full potential. Be specific—V7 can handle it.

step3.title: Generate & Refine
step3.desc: Watch as four unique variations appear in seconds. Upscale your favorites, iterate on what works, and download your masterpiece.

compare.title: V6 vs V7: The Upgrade
compare.subtitle: Here's exactly what's improved in the latest version

tips.title: Pro Tips
tips.subtitle: Get better results with these techniques

tip1.title: Be Specific
tip1.desc: The more detail you provide about character features, clothing, poses, and backgrounds, the closer V7 gets to your vision. Don't be shy—describe everything.

tip2.title: Master Aspect Ratios
tip2.desc: Use --ar to set your canvas. Try 3:4 for portraits, 16:9 for scenes, 1:1 for icons. The right ratio makes a huge difference.

tip3.title: Draft First, Refine Later
tip3.desc: Use draft mode to rapidly explore ideas at 10x speed and half cost. Once you find the direction you like, switch to full quality.

tip4.title: Build Your Style Library
tip4.desc: Save reference images that capture your aesthetic. Use --sref to maintain consistency across an entire series or character lineup.

faq.title: Got Questions?
faq.subtitle: Here's what people usually want to know

q1.question: What exactly is Niji Journey V7?
q1.answer: Niji V7 is the latest version of Nijijourney's AI image generation model, specifically designed for anime and illustration styles. It's developed in collaboration between Midjourney and Spellbrush, focusing on Eastern aesthetics and anime art.

q2.question: How do I actually use V7?
q2.answer: In Discord, add "--niji 7" to the end of your prompt. On the web interface at nijijourney.com, select "Niji 7" from the version dropdown. You'll need a Midjourney/Nijijourney subscription to generate images.

q3.question: Is there a free option?
q3.answer: Midjourney occasionally offers free trial periods. The basic subscription starts at $10/month with limited generations. Our tools here (prompt builder, templates, guides) are completely free to use.

q4.question: What's the real difference between V6 and V7?
q4.answer: V7 brings major improvements in coherency (especially eyes and hands), lineart quality, prompt understanding, and introduces draft mode for faster iteration. It's more literal in interpretation, so vague prompts may work differently than in V6.

q5.question: What's the --sref feature for?
q5.answer: Style Reference (--sref) lets you use an image URL to influence the visual style of your generation. It's perfect for maintaining a consistent aesthetic across multiple images, like for character sheets or series.

q6.question: Can I use the images commercially?
q6.answer: Yes, with a paid Midjourney subscription you own the rights to the images you create and can use them commercially. Check Midjourney's terms of service for specific details on your subscription tier.
